amendment.description: Amendment normalizes the operational test and evaluation process for the ballistic missile defense system by conforming the condition for proceeding beyond low-rate initial production in line with all other major defense acquisition programs.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 15 printed in House Report 115-217 to normalize the operational test and evaluation process for the ballistic missile defense system by conforming the condition for proceeding beyond low-rate initial production in line with all other major defense acquisition programs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lamborn amendment (A028) Agreed to by recorded vote: 235 - 189 (Roll no. 373).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A028) offered by Mr. Lamborn.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Lamborn amendment (A028) Agreed to by recorded vote: 235 - 189 (Roll no. 373).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
